name: UIListContentView
desc: A content view for displaying list-based content.

items.name: init(configuration: UIListContentConfiguration)
items.desc: Creates a list content view with the specified content configuration.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a list content view from data in an unarchiver.

items.name: var configuration: UIContentConfiguration
items.desc: The current configuration of the view.

items.name: var textLayoutGuide: UILayoutGuide?
items.desc: A guide for positioning the primary text in the content view.

items.name: var secondaryTextLayoutGuide: UILayoutGuide?
items.desc: A guide for positioning the secondary text in the content view.

items.name: var imageLayoutGuide: UILayoutGuide?
items.desc: A guide for positioning the image in the content view.
